WorkItem.Description:
In the sample W7StyleSample, start the application and then press the keys Tab, Right, Right. Do not use the mouse or click anywhere. After pressing the Right key for the second time, a NullReferenceException occurs in TreeViewExItem.OnKeyUp (line 419) because ParentTreeView.Selection.LastSelectedItem is null. This also happens when pressing Tab, Down, Down. While testing, I have observed this also with a few other combinations.
Â 
I could resolve the error by checking whether this expression is not null prior to using it.

Comments.Message: Sorry for the duplicate, CodePlex didn't finish loading the page so I assumed all is lost.
